verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mangalamuga paadudi krupa satyambunu ranguga jnanamichedu divya vaakyamu vijaya satyavedamu mangala nityadeepamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Suvisheshamunu prakatimpu krupa satyambunu paapa ghorambu thelpunu divya vaakyamu paraloka varshamu jnaana nimpudalayunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devudesu harshinchedu krupa satyambunu jeeva mangala vaakyamul divya vaakyamul Yesu nannu choodu nityamu shuddheekarinchu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rendu yanchula khadgamu krupa satyambunu ullamul kariginchedu divya vaakyamu yochanal Choopu darpanamu kalithileni jnaanamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aatma kaahaara midiye krupa satyambunu paapiki jeeva paanamu divya vaakyamu paadamulaku deepamu kaallaku manchi velgunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Viswaasula suvaarthaye krupa satyambunu nischayamaina punadiye divya vaakyamu vidudalanitchu satyamu unnatha loka satyamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Halleluya paadeda krupa satyambunu apavitrathanu pogottun divya vaakyamu prabhuvu naama midiye Naadu aastiyunide{/lang-eng}
